name: Cold Blooded Cube
description: You are a cube that no longer wants to be just a sheep and wants to make yourself famous whichever way it will be the easiest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4300 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Family Chipset / ATI Radeon HD 4200 Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / Vega 3 Storage: 30 MB available space
